text.section:
In addition to the information required by subsection (a) of this section, a contract for the sale of a new vehicle shall include:
The base price of the vehicle;
The manufacturer's code or stock number for the vehicle; and
A clear and specific description of each extra item and each extra charge not included in the base price of the vehicle ordered by the buyer.
When a vehicle arrives for delivery, the dealer shall advise the buyer of any extra items ordered by the buyer that are not on the vehicle.
When a vehicle arrives for delivery, the dealer shall advise the buyer of any extra items on the vehicle that the buyer did not order.
When a vehicle arrives for delivery, the dealer shall advise the buyer of the cost of extra items described under subsections (c) and (d) of this section.
